_header: There nas no god but gold alone
Subjects: wealth, evils of; sermons, verse in
_description: One of two related couplets on the evils of wealth in a Latin sermon for Trinity 23 — one couplet

CULIi38.Transcription:
Þer nas no god but gold aloneGod schal be god wan gold nys
                    none
